nodes.text: Sunry vs. the Ahto City Authority

Sunry vs. the Ahto City Authority was a trial held in 3956 BBY by the Ahto City Civil Authority, where Sunry was tried for the murder of Elassa Huros. Revan defended Sunry. Witnesses were Ignus, Firith Me, Gluupor, Elora, and Sunry. The presiding judges were Shelkar, Jhosa, Naleshekan, Kota, and Duula. The end result was the acquittal of Sunry on all charges. Elassa's killer was never identified.
